name: Hate speech
description: Hate speech is one of the most common issue prevalent on all social media platforms, According to research more than 4000 social media sites containing hate speech were blocked through PTA, this game depicts the hatred and frustration that occurs as a result of the hate speech that occurs online, debates regarding religious, social and political matters turn into heated arguments, the words become a “ticking bomb” which could blast anytime. The exchange of harsh views and criticisms effects the young minds of children as well as adults that could turn into something extremely serious that one could not even imagine.
